# Preface {-}

ArchR is a full-featured software suite for the analysis of single-cell chromatin accessibility data. It is designed to handle hundreds of thousands of single cells, keeping pace with the experimental scale that is achievable with commercial platforms such as the 10x Genomics Chromium system.
